admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The Thrace Gas Exploration Project is to
            asess the hydrocarbon potential of the borrower's
            licenses in the Thrace basin and implement an integrated
            basin-oriented exploration program. The project includes
            completion of infill seismic mapping of the entire licensed
            areas, detailed seismic lines on structures of interest for
            drilling, drilling of 11 wells, rehabilitation of three
            drilling rigs and technical assistance, studies and training.
